summary.span: Provides interaction with Windows event logs.

span.span: Provides interaction with Windows event logs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可访问或自定义 Windows 事件日志，记录有关重要的软件或硬件事件的信息。 lets you access or customize Windows event logs, which record information about important software or hardware events. 使用，可以从现有日志读取、 将条目写入到日志、 创建或删除事件源，删除日志，并响应日志条目。Using , you can read from existing logs, write entries to logs, create or delete event sources, delete logs, and respond to log entries. 创建事件源时，你还可以创建新的日志。You can also create new logs when creating an event source. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此类型实现接口。This type implements the interface. 在使用完类型后，您应直接或间接释放类型。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接释放类型，调用其中的方法`try` / `catch`块。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"使用实现 IDisposable 的对象"部分接口主题。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. 除了提供对个人事件日志和其条目访问类可访问的所有事件日志的集合。In addition to providing access to individual event logs and their entries, the class lets you access the collection of all event logs. 你可以使用`static`的成员若要删除日志，获取日志列表、 创建或删除源，或确定是否计算机已包含一个特定的源。You can use the `static` members of to delete logs, get log lists, create or delete a source, or determine if a computer already contains a particular source. 有三个默认事件日志： 应用程序、 系统和安全。There are three default event logs: Application, System, and Security. 安全日志是只读的。A Security log is read-only. 其他应用程序和安装，如 Active Directory 的服务可能具有其他事件日志。Other applications and services you install, such as Active Directory, might have additional event logs. 安全注意事项在使用时有类。There are security considerations when using the class. 需要的.NET Framework 2.0 和更高版本中的特定操作或在.NET Framework 1.0 和 1.1 中的完全信任权限。 requires permissions for specific actions in the .NET Framework 2.0 and later versions, or full trust in the .NET Framework 1.0 and 1.1. 我们建议，不授予给部分受信任的代码。We recommend that not be granted to partially trusted code. 你决不要将传递任何事件日志的对象，包括和对象，不太受信任的代码。You should never pass any event log object, including and objects, to less trusted code. 例如，创建对象、 写入条目，然后将到部分受信任的代码的对象可以为创建安全问题，因为能够读取和写入事件日志允许代码执行操作，如发布另一个应用程序的名称的事件日志消息。For example, creating an object, writing an entry, and then passing the object to partially trusted code can create a security issue, because the ability to read and write to the event log allows code to perform actions such as issuing event log messages in the name of another application. 从 Windows Vista 开始，用户帐户控制 (UAC) 决定用户的凭据。Starting with Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the credentials of a user. 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，将为您分配两个运行时访问令牌：一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 默认情况下，您拥有标准用户角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 若要运行的代码访问安全日志，首先必须将你的凭据从标准用户提升至管理员。To run the code that accesses the Security log, you must first elevate your credentials from standard user to administrator. 通过打开应用程序的快捷菜单启动应用程序时可以执行此操作 （如果你使用鼠标，右键单击应用程序图标） 并指示你想要以管理员身份运行。You can do this when you start an application by opening the shortcut menu for the application (if you're using a mouse, right-click the application icon) and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. 你可以使用来创建自定义你可以查看通过服务器的事件日志的事件查看器。You can use to create custom event logs that you can view through the server's Event Viewer. 使用方法以在事件查看器显示你的事件日志的本地化的名称。Use the method to display a localized name for your event log in the Event Viewer. 使用方法来配置你的事件日志的行为，当它达到其最大日志大小。Use the method to configure the behavior of your event log when it reaches its maximum log size. 若要从事件日志中读取，指定日志名称 (属性) 和服务器计算机名称 (事件日志的属性。To read from an event log, specify the log name ( property) and server computer name ( property for the event log. 如果你未指定服务器的计算机名称，本地计算机，"。"，则假定。If you don't specify the server computer name, the local computer, ".", is assumed. 不需要指定事件源 (属性)，因为源是只有需要写入日志。It's not necessary to specify the event source ( property), because a source is required only for writing to logs. 属性自动填充的条目的事件日志的列表。The property is automatically populated with the event log's list of entries. 若要写入事件日志，请指定或创建事件源 (属性)。To write to an event log, specify or create an event source ( property). 若要创建新的事件源的计算机上，必须具有管理凭据。You must have administrative credentials on the computer to create a new event source. 事件源将你的应用程序注册的有效项源作为事件日志。The event source registers your application with the event log as a valid source of entries. 事件源可用于写入一次只有一个日志。You can use the event source to write to only one log at a time. 属性可以是任何随机字符串，但该名称必须是不同于计算机上的其他源。The property can be any random string, but the name must be distinct from other sources on the computer. 事件源通常是应用程序或另一个标识字符串的名称。The event source is typically the name of the application or another identifying string. 尝试创建重复值引发异常。Trying to create a duplicate value throws an exception. 但是，单个事件日志可能与多个源。However, a single event log can be associated with multiple sources. 如果事件日志的事件源关联实例不存在，则创建新的事件源。If the event source for the event log associated with the instance doesn't exist, a new event source is created. 若要创建的事件源在 Windows Vista 或更高版本或 Windows Server 2003，必须具有管理凭据。To create an event source in Windows Vista and later or Windows Server 2003, you must have administrative credentials. 此要求是因为必须搜索所有事件日志，包括安全日志，以确定事件源是否是唯一的。This requirement is because all event logs, including Security logs, must be searched to determine whether the event source is unique. 从 Windows Vista 开始，用户没有权限访问安全事件日志中。因此，引发。Starting with Windows Vista, users do not have permission to access the Security log; therefore, a is thrown. > [!IMPORTANT] > 创建或删除事件源需要通过使用命名的互斥体的基础代码的同步。Creating or deleting an event source requires synchronization of the underlying code by using a named mutex. 如果具有高特权的应用程序锁定命名互斥体，尝试创建或删除事件源将导致应用程序停止响应，直到该锁被释放。If a highly privileged application locks the named mutex, trying to create or delete an event source causes the application to stop responding until the lock is released. 若要防止此问题，永远不会授予到不受信任的代码的权限。To help prevent this problem, never grant permission to untrusted code. 此外，权限可能允许绕开其他权限和仅应授予高度受信任的代码。In addition, permission potentially allows other permissions to be bypassed and should only be granted to highly trusted code. 应用程序和服务应写入应用程序日志或自定义日志。Applications and services should write to the Application log or to a custom log. 设备驱动程序应写入系统日志。Device drivers should write to the System log. 如果未显式设置属性，默认为应用程序日志的事件日志。If you do not explicitly set the property, the event log defaults to the Application log. > [!NOTE] > 无需进行任何以防止应用程序编写为任何已注册的源。There is nothing to protect an application from writing as any registered source. 如果应用程序被授予权限，它可以编写任何有效的源的计算机上注册的事件。If an application is granted permission, it can write events for any valid source registered on the computer. 使用和方法来向事件日志写入事件。Use the and methods to write events to an event log. 必须指定事件源写入事件;你必须创建并在编写与源的第一个条目之前，配置事件源。You must specify an event source to write events; you must create and configure the event source before writing the first entry with the source. 在你的应用程序的安装过程中创建新的事件源。Create the new event source during the installation of your application. 这样，可以为操作系统来刷新其已注册的事件源的列表和其配置的时间。This allows time for the operating system to refresh its list of registered event sources and their configuration. 如果操作系统未刷新其事件源的列表，并且尝试写入新的源的事件写入操作将失败。If the operating system hasn't refreshed its list of event sources, and you try to write an event with the new source, the write operation will fail. 你可以使用配置新的源对象或方法。You can configure a new source by using an object or the method. 若要创建新的事件源的计算机上，必须具有管理凭据。You must have administrative credentials on the computer to create a new event source. 每个源可以一次; 写入只有一个事件日志但是，你的应用程序可以使用多个源写入多个事件日志。Each source can write to only one event log at a time; however, your application can use multiple sources to write to multiple event logs. 例如，你的应用程序可能需要为不同的事件日志或不同的资源文件配置的多个源。For example, your application might require multiple sources configured for different event logs or different resource files. 若要更改现有源的配置详细信息，必须删除源，然后使用新的配置创建。To change the configuration details of an existing source, you must delete the source and then create it with the new configuration. 如果其他应用程序或组件使用的现有源，请使用更新的配置，而不是删除现有的源创建新的源。If other applications or components use the existing source, create a new source with the updated configuration instead of deleting the existing source. 你可以先使用本地化的资源注册事件源，为你的事件类别和消息字符串。You can register the event source with localized resources for your event category and message strings. 你的应用程序可以通过使用资源标识符而不指定的实际字符串值编写事件日志条目。Your application can write event log entries by using resource identifiers instead of specifying the actual string values. 请参阅和有关的资源文件配置您的源的详细信息的类。Refer to the and classes for more information about configuring your source with resource files. 如果你的应用程序将直接写入事件日志的字符串值，你不需要设置源的文件属性的资源。If your application writes string values directly to the event log, you do not have to set the resource file properties for the source. 要写入本地化的项还是要直接写入字符串，则必须配置源。The source must be configured either for writing localized entries or for writing direct strings. 如果你的应用程序将使用资源标识符和字符串值的条目，则必须注册两个单独的源。If your application writes entries using both resource identifiers and string values, you must register two separate sources. 例如，使用资源文件，配置一个源，然后使用在该源方法来编写使用到事件日志的资源标识符的条目。For example, configure one source with resource files, and then use that source in the method to write entries using resource identifiers to the event log. 然后创建不同的源，而无需资源文件，并使用在该源方法使用该源的事件日志中直接写入字符串。Then create a different source without resource files, and use that source in the method to write strings directly to the event log using that source. 写入事件时，你必须至少指定一个消息字符串或消息字符串的资源标识符。When writing events, you must at least specify either a message string or the resource identifier for a message string. 其他事件属性都是可选的。Other event properties are optional. 可选事件设置的示例包括：Examples of optional event settings include the following: - 你可以设置指定事件查看器显示的项的图标。You can set the to specify the icon that the Event Viewer displays for the entry. - 如果你的应用程序使用类别进行筛选的事件，可以指定事件的类别标识符。You can specify a category identifier for the event, if your application uses categories for filtering the events. - 如果你想要将其他信息与给定的事件相关联，你可以将二进制数据附加到事件项。You can attach binary data to your event entry if you want to associate additional information with a given event. > [!IMPORTANT] > 事件日志记录占用磁盘空间、 处理器时间和其他系统资源。Event logging consumes disk space, processor time, and other system resources. 请务必仅记录基本信息。It is important to log only essential information. 我们建议将事件日志调用放在错误路径中，而不是在主代码路径中，因此它们不会影响性能。We recommend that you place event log calls in an error path, rather than in the main code path, so they don't adversely affect performance. 有关的实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的示例创建事件源`MySource`如果它尚不存在，并将项写入事件日志`MyNewLog`。The following example creates the event source `MySource` if it doesn't already exist, and writes an entry to the event log `MyNewLog`. > [!NOTE] > 从 Windows Vista 开始，你必须以管理员身份运行此应用程序。Starting with Windows Vista, you must run this application as an administrator. [!code-cpp[Classic EventLog.CreateEventSource Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic EventLog.CreateEventSource Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic EventLog.CreateEventSource Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic EventLog.CreateEventSource Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic EventLog.CreateEventSource Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic EventLog.CreateEventSource Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数设置属性`logName`参数，属性`machineName`参数，与属性`source`参数。This constructor sets the property to the `logName` parameter, the property to the `machineName` parameter, and the property to the `source` parameter. 属性是必需的写入事件日志时。The property is required when writing to an event log. 但是，如果你只是从读取事件日志，仅和属性都是必需 （只要服务器上的事件日志具有已与它关联的源）。However, if you are only reading from an event log, only the and properties are required (as long as the event log on the server has a source already associated with it). 如果你只是读取从事件日志，可能可以满足另一个重载构造函数。If you are only reading from the event log, another overload of the constructor might suffice. 下表显示的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |属性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`source`参数。The `source` parameter.| ||`logName`参数。The `logName` parameter.| ||`machineName`参数。The `machineName` parameter.| ## Examples 下面的示例一个项写入事件日志中，"MyNewLog"，使用源""的本地计算机上。The following example writes an entry to an event log, "MyNewLog", on the local computer, using the source "MySource". summary.span: Removes all entries from the event log.

span.span: Removes all entries from the event log.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件日志设置最大大小，它确定它们可以包含的项数。Event logs are set with a maximum size that determines how many entries they can contain. 当事件日志已满时，它将停止记录新的事件信息，或开始覆盖以前的项。When an event log is full, it stops recording new event information or begins to overwrite earlier entries. 如果事件录制停止后，你可以使用此方法要清除日志中的现有条目，并允许它重新开始记录事件。If event recording stops, you can use this method to clear the log of existing entries and allow it to start recording events again. 你必须具有到日志驻留以清除事件日志条目的计算机的管理员权限。You must have administrator permissions to the computer on which the log resides to clear event log entries. 关闭事件日志、 释放事件句柄，检索新读取和写入句柄，并重新打开事件日志。 closes the event log, releases the event handles, retrieves new read and write handles, and reopens the event log. 对方法的调用后收到的事件不会清除与现有的事件中。Events received after the call to the method are not cleared along with the existing events. ## Examples 下面的示例清除事件日志。The following example clears an event log. > [!CAUTION] > 因为应用程序、 系统、 安全性和其他非自定义日志可能包含重要信息;请确保在执行此示例代码之前指定自定义日志。Because Application, System, Security, and other non-custom logs can contain crucial information; be sure to specify a custom log before executing this example code. 此示例将删除自定义日志`myNewLog`。This example deletes the custom log `myNewLog`. [!code-cpp[Classic EventLog.Clear Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic EventLog.Clear Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic EventLog.Clear Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic EventLog.Clear Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic EventLog.Clear Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic EventLog.Clear Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重载用于配置新的源用于将本地计算机或远程计算机上写入事件日志条目。Use this overload to configure a new source for writing entries to an event log on the local computer or a remote computer. 不需要使用此方法从事件日志进行读取。It is not necessary to use this method to read from an event log. 方法使用输入`sourceData` ，和属性以创建新的源和其关联的事件日志在目标计算机上的注册表值。The method uses the input `sourceData`, and properties to create registry values on the target computer for the new source and its associated event log. 新的源名称不能与现有源名称或目标计算机上的现有事件日志名称匹配。A new source name cannot match an existing source name or an existing event log name on the target computer. 如果属性未设置，为应用程序事件日志注册源。If the property is not set, the source is registered for the Application event log. 如果未设置，在本地计算机上注册源。If the is not set, the source is registered on the local computer. > [!NOTE] > 若要创建的事件源在 Windows Vista 或更高版本或 Windows Server 2003，必须具有管理权限。To create an event source in Windows Vista and later or Windows Server 2003, you must have administrative privileges. > > 此要求的原因是所有的事件日志，包括安全性，必须进行搜索以确定事件源是否唯一。The reason for this requirement is that all event logs, including security, must be searched to determine whether the event source is unique. 从 Windows Vista 开始，用户没有权限访问安全事件日志中。因此，引发。Starting with Windows Vista, users do not have permission to access the security log; therefore, a is thrown. > > 从 Windows Vista 开始，用户帐户控制 (UAC) 决定用户的特权。Starting with Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，将为您分配两个运行时访问令牌：一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 默认情况下，您拥有标准用户角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 若要执行的代码访问安全日志，首先必须将你的特权从标准用户提升至管理员。To execute the code that accesses the security log, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator. 你可以通过以下方式执行此操作：右键单击应用程序图标并指示需以管理员身份运行。You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. 使用和事件写入事件日志。Use and to write events to an event log. 必须指定事件源写入事件;你必须创建并在编写与源的第一个条目之前，配置事件源。You must specify an event source to write events; you must create and configure the event source before writing the first entry with the source. 在你的应用程序的安装过程中创建新的事件源。Create the new event source during the installation of your application. 这样，可以为操作系统来刷新其已注册的事件源的列表和其配置的时间。This allows time for the operating system to refresh its list of registered event sources and their configuration. 如果操作系统未刷新其事件源的列表，并尝试写入新的源的事件写入操作将失败。If the operating system has not refreshed its list of event sources, and you attempt to write an event with the new source, the write operation will fail. 你可以配置新的源使用，或使用方法。You can configure a new source using an , or using the method. 若要创建新的事件源的计算机上，必须具有管理权限。You must have administrative rights on the computer to create a new event source. 你可以创建现有的事件日志或新的事件日志的事件源。You can create an event source for an existing event log or a new event log. 在创建新的源的新的事件日志时，系统将为该日志，此源注册，但之前向其中写入的第一个条目，将不会创建日志。When you create a new source for a new event log, the system registers the source for that log, but the log is not created until the first entry is written to it. 操作系统将事件日志存储为文件。The operating system stores event logs as files. 当你使用或若要创建新的事件日志，关联的文件存储在指定的计算机上的 %SystemRoot%\System32\Config 目录。When you use or to create a new event log, the associated file is stored in the %SystemRoot%\System32\Config directory on the specified computer. 通过追加的前 8 个字符设置的文件名称".evt"文件扩展名的属性。The file name is set by appending the first 8 characters of the property with the ".evt" file name extension. 每个源可以仅写入只有一个事件日志一次;但是，你的应用程序可以使用多个源写入多个事件日志。Each source can only write to only one event log at a time; however, your application can use multiple sources to write to multiple event logs. 例如，你的应用程序可能需要为不同的事件日志或不同的资源文件配置的多个源。For example, your application might require multiple sources configured for different event logs or different resource files. 你可以先使用本地化的资源文件注册事件源，为你的事件类别和消息字符串。You can register the event source with localized resource file(s) for your event category and message strings. 你的应用程序可以写入事件日志项使用资源标识符，而不指定实际的字符串。Your application can write event log entries using resource identifiers, rather than specifying the actual string. 事件查看器使用的资源标识符来查找并显示基于当前语言设置的本地化的资源文件中的相应字符串。The Event Viewer uses the resource identifier to find and display the corresponding string from the localized resource file based on current language settings. 你可以注册为事件类别、 消息和参数插入字符串，单独的文件，或者也可以注册为所有三种类型的字符串的相同资源文件。You can register a separate file for event categories, messages and parameter insertion strings, or you can register the same resource file for all three types of strings. 使用， ， ，和属性来配置要向事件日志写入本地化的条目的源。Use the , , , and properties to configure the source to write localized entries to the event log. 如果你的应用程序将直接写入事件日志的字符串值，你不需要设置这些属性。If your application writes strings values directly to the event log, you do not need to set these properties. 要写入本地化的项还是要直接写入字符串，则必须配置源。The source must be configured either for writing localized entries or for writing direct strings. 如果你的应用程序将使用资源标识符和字符串值的条目，则必须注册两个单独的源。If your application writes entries using both resource identifiers and string values, you must register two separate sources. 例如，使用资源文件，配置一个源，然后使用在该源方法来编写使用到事件日志的资源标识符的条目。For example, configure one source with resource files, and then use that source in the method to write entries using resource identifiers to the event log. 然后创建不同的源，而无需资源文件，并使用在该源方法使用该源的事件日志中直接写入字符串。Then create a different source without resource files, and use that source in the method to write strings directly to the event log using that source. 若要更改现有源的配置详细信息，必须删除源，然后使用新的配置创建。To change the configuration details of an existing source, you must delete the source and then create it with the new configuration. 如果其他应用程序或组件使用的现有源，请使用更新的配置，而无需删除现有的源创建新的源。If other applications or components use the existing source, create a new source with the updated configuration rather than deleting the existing source. > [!NOTE] > 如果源配置为事件日志，并且重新配置为另一个事件日志，必须重新启动计算机才能使更改生效。If a source is configured for an event log, and you reconfigure it for another event log, you must restart the computer for the changes to take effect. ## Examples 下面的示例确定是否将名为事件源`SampleApplicationSource`已在本地计算机上注册。The following example determines whether the event source named `SampleApplicationSource` is registered on the local computer. 如果事件源不存在，该示例设置源的消息资源文件，并创建新的事件源。If the event source does not exist, the example sets the message resource file for the source and creates the new event source. 最后，该示例设置使用中的资源标识符值的事件日志的本地化的显示名称`DisplayNameMsgId`和中的资源文件路径`messageFile`。Finally, the example sets the localized display name for the event log, using the resource identifier value in `DisplayNameMsgId` and the resource file path in `messageFile`. [!code-cpp[EventLog_WriteEvent#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CPP/source.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[EventLog_WriteEvent#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CS/source.cs#6)] [!code-vb[EventLog_WriteEvent#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/VB/source.vb#6)] 该示例使用以下的消息文本文件，内置于 EventLogMsgs.dll 的资源库。The example uses the following message text file, built into the resource library EventLogMsgs.dll. 消息文本文件是从其创建的消息资源文件的源。A message text file is the source from which the message resource file is created. 消息文本文件定义的资源标识符和类别、 事件消息和参数插入字符串的文本。The message text file defines the resource identifiers and text for the category, event message, and parameter insertion strings. 具体而言，为事件日志的本地化名称定义了资源标识符 5001。Specifically, resource identifier 5001 is defined for the localized name of the event log. ``` ; // EventLogMsgs.mc ; // ******************************************************** ; // Use the following commands to build this file: ; // mc -s EventLogMsgs.mc ; // rc EventLogMsgs.rc ; // link /DLL /SUBSYSTEM:WINDOWS /NOENTRY /MACHINE:x86 EventLogMsgs.Res ; // ******************************************************** ; // - Event categories - ; // Categories must be numbered consecutively starting at 1. ; // ******************************************************** MessageId=0x1 Severity=Success SymbolicName=INSTALL_CATEGORY Language=English Installation . MessageId=0x2 Severity=Success SymbolicName=QUERY_CATEGORY Language=English Database Query . MessageId=0x3 Severity=Success SymbolicName=REFRESH_CATEGORY Language=English Data Refresh . ; // - Event messages - ; // ********************************* MessageId = 1000 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_SUCCESS_MESSAGE_ID_1000 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1000, called from %1. . MessageId = 1001 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_FAILED_MESSAGE_ID_1001 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1001, called from %1. . MessageId = 1002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_INFO_MESSAGE_ID_1002 Language=English My generic information message in English, for message id 1002. . MessageId = 1003 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_WARNING_MESSAGE_ID_1003 Language=English My generic warning message in English, for message id 1003, called from %1. . MessageId = 1004 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = UPDATE_CYCLE_COMPLETE_MESSAGE_ID_1004 Language=English The update cycle is complete for %%5002. . MessageId = 1005 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = SERVER_CONNECTION_DOWN_MESSAGE_ID_1005 Language=English The refresh operation did not complete because the connection to server %1 could not be established. . ; // - Event log display name - ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5001 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_DISPLAY_NAME_MSGID Language=English Sample Event Log . ; // - Event message parameters - ; // Language independent insertion strings ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_SERVICE_NAME_MSGID Language=English SVC_UPDATE.EXE . ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此重载来创建自定义日志，或要创建并注册向本地计算机上现有的日志。Use this overload to create a custom log or to create and register a to an existing log on the local computer. 如果`logName`是`null`或空字符串 ("") 时调用，日志将默认为应用程序日志。If `logName` is `null` or an empty string ("") when you call , the log defaults to the Application log. 如果本地计算机上不存在该日志，系统创建自定义日志，并将注册应用程序作为为该日志。If the log does not exist on the local computer, the system creates a custom log and registers your application as a for that log. > [!NOTE] > 若要创建的事件源在 Windows Vista 或更高版本或 Windows Server 2003，必须具有管理权限。To create an event source in Windows Vista and later or Windows Server 2003, you must have administrative privileges. > > 此要求的原因是所有的事件日志，包括安全性，必须进行搜索以确定事件源是否唯一。The reason for this requirement is that all event logs, including security, must be searched to determine whether the event source is unique. 从 Windows Vista 开始，用户没有权限访问安全事件日志中。因此，引发。Starting with Windows Vista, users do not have permission to access the security log; therefore, a is thrown. > > 在 Windows Vista 或更高版本中，用户帐户控制 (UAC) 决定用户的特权。In Windows Vista and later, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，将为您分配两个运行时访问令牌：一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 默认情况下，您拥有标准用户角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 若要执行的代码访问安全日志，首先必须将你的特权从标准用户提升至管理员。To execute the code that accesses the security log, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator. 你可以通过以下方式执行此操作：右键单击应用程序图标并指示需以管理员身份运行。You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. 只需创建事件源，如果要写入事件日志。You only need to create an event source if you are writing to the event log. 然后再写入事件日志条目，你必须将注册事件源的事件日志有效的事件源。Before writing an entry to an event log, you must register the event source with the event log as a valid source of events. 当你编写日志条目时，系统将使用以查找相应的日志要在其中放置你的条目。When you write a log entry, the system uses the to find the appropriate log in which to place your entry. 如果您正在读取事件日志，你可以指定，或和。If you are reading the event log, you can either specify the , or a and . > [!NOTE] > 你不需要指定如果要连接到本地计算机上的日志。You are not required to specify the if you are connecting to a log on the local computer. 如果不指定时从日志读取本地计算机 ("。") 假定。If you do not specify the when reading from a log, the local computer (".") is assumed. 使用和事件写入事件日志。Use and to write events to an event log. 必须指定事件源写入事件;你必须创建并在编写与源的第一个条目之前，配置事件源。You must specify an event source to write events; you must create and configure the event source before writing the first entry with the source. 在你的应用程序的安装过程中创建新的事件源。Create the new event source during the installation of your application. 这样，可以为操作系统来刷新其已注册的事件源的列表和其配置的时间。This allows time for the operating system to refresh its list of registered event sources and their configuration. 如果操作系统未刷新其事件源的列表，并尝试写入新的源的事件写入操作将失败。If the operating system has not refreshed its list of event sources, and you attempt to write an event with the new source, the write operation will fail. 你可以配置新的源使用，或使用方法。You can configure a new source using an , or using the method. 若要创建新的事件源的计算机上，必须具有管理权限。You must have administrative rights on the computer to create a new event source. 你可以创建现有的事件日志或新的事件日志的事件源。You can create an event source for an existing event log or a new event log. 在创建新的源的新的事件日志时，系统将为该日志，此源注册，但之前向其中写入的第一个条目，将不会创建日志。When you create a new source for a new event log, the system registers the source for that log, but the log is not created until the first entry is written to it. 操作系统将事件日志存储为文件。The operating system stores event logs as files. 当你使用或若要创建新的事件日志，关联的文件存储在指定的计算机上的 %SystemRoot%\System32\Config 目录。When you use or to create a new event log, the associated file is stored in the %SystemRoot%\System32\Config directory on the specified computer. 通过追加的前 8 个字符设置的文件名称".evt"文件扩展名的属性。The file name is set by appending the first 8 characters of the property with the ".evt" file name extension. 必须是唯一的本地计算机; 上的源新的源名称不能与现有源名称或现有的事件日志名称匹配。The source must be unique on the local computer; a new source name cannot match an existing source name or an existing event log name. 每个源可以一次; 写入只有一个事件日志但是，你的应用程序可以使用多个源写入多个事件日志。Each source can write to only one event log at a time; however, your application can use multiple sources to write to multiple event logs. 例如，你的应用程序可能需要为不同的事件日志或不同的资源文件配置的多个源。For example, your application might require multiple sources configured for different event logs or different resource files. 要写入本地化的项还是要直接写入字符串，则必须配置源。The source must be configured either for writing localized entries or for writing direct strings. 如果你的应用程序将使用资源标识符和字符串值的条目，则必须注册两个单独的源。If your application writes entries using both resource identifiers and string values, you must register two separate sources. 例如，使用资源文件，配置一个源，然后使用在该源方法来编写使用到事件日志的资源标识符的条目。For example, configure one source with resource files, and then use that source in the method to write entries using resource identifiers to the event log. 然后创建不同的源，而无需资源文件，并使用在该源方法使用该源的事件日志中直接写入字符串。Then create a different source without resource files, and use that source in the method to write strings directly to the event log using that source. 若要更改现有源的配置详细信息，必须删除源，然后使用新的配置创建。To change the configuration details of an existing source, you must delete the source and then create it with the new configuration. 如果其他应用程序或组件使用的现有源，请使用更新的配置，而无需删除现有的源创建新的源。If other applications or components use the existing source, create a new source with the updated configuration rather than deleting the existing source. > [!NOTE] > 如果源已映射到某个日志并重新映射到新的日志，必须重新启动计算机才能使更改生效。If a source has already been mapped to a log and you remap it to a new log, you must restart the computer for the changes to take effect. ## Examples 下面的示例创建源`MySource`如果它尚不存在，并将项写入事件日志`MyNewLog`。The following example creates the source `MySource` if it does not already exist, and writes an entry to the event log `MyNewLog`. [!code-cpp[Classic EventLog.CreateEventSource Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic EventLog.CreateEventSource Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic EventLog.CreateEventSource Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic EventLog.CreateEventSource Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic EventLog.CreateEventSource Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic EventLog.CreateEventSource Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你想要删除的日志位于本地计算机上，请使用此方法。Use this method when the log you want to delete is on the local computer. 你可以删除的计算机上，任何日志，前提是您具有适当的注册表权限。You can delete any log on the computer, provided you have the appropriate registry permissions. 删除指定的日志`logName`来自本地计算机。 removes the log specified by `logName` from the local computer. 如果你想要删除仅源注册到日志，请调用。If you want to delete only the source registered to a log, call . 如果你只想要删除的日志条目，调用。If you only want to delete the log entries, call . 和是`static`方法，以便它们可以调用类本身上。 and are `static` methods, so they can be called on the class itself. 不需要创建的新实例调用任何一种方法。It is not necessary to create a new instance of to call either method. 方法首先删除存储日志的内容的文件。The method first deletes the file that holds the contents of the log. 然后，访问注册表，并删除为该日志注册的所有事件源。It then accesses the registry and removes all the event sources registered for that log. 如果重新创建在以后的日志时，你应该它们是否要重用再次注册事件源。If you recreate the log at a later point, you should register the event sources again, if they are to be reused. 如果不注册事件源和其他用户的事件源编写无需指定日志名称，将在应用程序事件日志中创建事件源。If you do not register the event sources and other users write to an event source without specifying a log name, the event source will be created in the Application event log. 因此，应用程序以前曾经将条目写入到删除并重新创建的日志将写入到应用程序日志相反，因为它现在包含事件源。Therefore, applications that previously were able to write entries to the log you deleted and recreated will write to the Application log instead, because it now contains the event source. > [!NOTE] > 重新创建事件日志可以是一个复杂的过程。Recreating an event log can be a difficult process. 避免删除任何系统创建事件日志，如应用程序日志。Avoid deleting any of the system-created event logs, such as the Application log. 删除通过调用日志会自动删除已注册到该日志的源。Deleting a log through a call to automatically deletes the sources registered to that log. 这会使其他应用程序使用该日志不起作用。This can make other applications using that log inoperative. ## Examples 下面的示例从本地计算机中删除日志。The following example deletes a log from the local computer. 该示例可确定从其源日志。The example determines the log from its source. > [!NOTE] > 多个源可能会写入事件日志。More than one source might write to an event log. 在删除之前自定义日志，请确保没有其他源写入该日志。Before deleting a custom log, make sure there are no other sources writing to that log. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于删除的注册来自本地计算机。Use this method to remove the registration of a from the local computer. 访问本地计算机上的注册表并删除的应用程序作为有效的事件源注册。 accesses the registry on the local computer and removes the registration of your application as a valid source of events. 如果你不再需要它来写入该日志条目，则可以删除你的组件作为有效的事件源。You can remove your component as a valid source of events if you no longer need it to write entries to that log. 例如，如果你需要将你的组件从一个日志更改为另一个可能会执行此操作。For example, you might do this if you need to change your component from one log to another. 因为源一次只能注册到一个日志，更改日志，您必须删除当前的注册。Because a source can only be registered to one log at a time, changing the log requires you to remove the current registration. 删除中仅注册到日志的源。 removes only the source registered to a log. 如果你想要移除日志本身，调用。If you want to remove the log itself, call . 如果你只想要删除的日志条目，调用。If you only want to delete the log entries, call . 和是`static`方法，以便它们可以调用类本身上。 and are `static` methods, so they can be called on the class itself. 不需要创建的实例调用任何一种方法。It is not necessary to create an instance of to call either method. 删除通过调用日志会自动删除已注册到该日志的源。Deleting a log through a call to automatically deletes the sources registered to that log. 这会使其他应用程序使用该日志不起作用。This can make other applications using that log inoperative. > [!NOTE] > 如果源已映射到某个日志并重新映射到新的日志，必须重新启动计算机才能使更改生效。If a source has already been mapped to a log and you remap it to a new log, you must restart the computer for the changes to take effect. ## Examples 下面的示例从本地计算机中删除源。The following example deletes a source from the local computer. 该示例确定从其源日志，然后删除该日志。The example determines the log from its source, and then deletes the log. > [!NOTE] > 多个源可能会写入事件日志。More than one source might write to an event log. 在删除之前自定义日志，请确保没有其他源写入该日志。Before deleting a custom log, make sure there are no other sources writing to that log. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定是否条目写入到日志时引发事件。The property determines whether the raises events when entries are written to the log. 当该属性是`true`，接收组件事件将收到通知任何时间在指定的日志中写入一项属性。When the property is `true`, components that receive the event will receive notification any time an entry is written to the log that is specified in the property. 如果是`false`，会引发任何事件。If is `false`, no events are raised. > [!NOTE] > 仅在本地计算机上写入项时，可以接收事件通知。You can receive event notifications only when entries are written on the local computer. 无法接收在远程计算机上写入项的通知。You cannot receive notifications for entries written on remote computers. ## Examples 下面的示例处理事件。The following example handles an event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用成员从事件日志中读取时。Use the member when reading from the event log. 因为该属性是只读的不能修改一项或写入日志使用。Because the property is read-only, you cannot modify an entry or write to the log using . 相反，指定并调用写入新的日志项。Instead, specify a and call to write a new log entry. 你可以使用若要计算的事件日志中的条目数并查看每个集合中。You can use to count the number of entries in the event log, and view each in the collection. 使用索引成员，如检索有关特定条目，信息， ， ，或。Use the indexed member to retrieve information about a specific entry, such as , , , or . 不需要指定时仅从日志中读取。It is not necessary to specify a when only reading from a log. 你可以仅指定名称和（服务器计算机名称） 属性实例。You can specify only the name and (server computer name) properties for the instance. 在任一情况下，成员会自动填充的条目的事件日志的列表。In either case, the member is automatically populated with the event log's list of entries. 此列表以读取各个项中，可以选择适当的索引的项。You can select the appropriate index for an item in this list to read individual entries. 读取和写入日志项之间的一个重要区别在于不需要显式调用读取的方法。An important distinction between reading and writing log entries is that it is not necessary to explicitly call a read method. 后和指定，属性自动填充。After the and are specified, the property is automatically populated. 如果你更改的值或属性，属性重新填充你阅读下一次。If you change the value of the or property, the property is repopulated the next time you read it. > [!NOTE] > 你不需要指定如果要连接到日志。You are not required to specify the if you are connecting to a log. 如果不指定，本地计算机，"。"，则假定。If you do not specify the , the local computer, ".", is assumed. ## Examples 下面的示例读取在事件日志中，"MyNewLog"本地计算机上的项。The following example reads entries in the event log, "MyNewLog", on the local computer. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要获取事件通知，必须设置到`true`。To get event notifications, you must set to `true`. 只有在本地计算机上写入项时，只能接收事件通知。You can only receive event notifications when entries are written on the local computer. 无法接收在远程计算机上写入项的通知。You cannot receive notifications for entries written on remote computers. 创建 委托时，需要标识将要处理该事件的方法。When you create an delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 每当发生该事件时，直到移除了该委托，都会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, until you remove the delegate. 有关与委托一起处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events with delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 系统响应仅当最后一个写入事件发生至少为六秒以前。The system responds to only if the last write event occurred at least six seconds previously. 这意味着你将仅收到一个六秒间隔内的事件通知，即使多个事件日志更改时发生。This implies you will only receive one event notification within a six-second interval, even if more than one event log change occurs. 如果插入到的调用之间的足够长的休眠时间间隔 （大约为 10 秒钟） ，你不太可能丢失事件。If you insert a sufficiently long sleep interval (around 10 seconds) between calls to , you are less likely to miss an event. 但是，如果更频繁地发生写入事件，你可能无法收到事件通知，直到下一个间隔。However, if write events occur more frequently, you might not recieve the event notification until the next interval. 通常情况下，丢失的事件通知将不丢失，而延迟。Typically, missed event notifications are not lost, but delayed. ## Examples 下面的示例处理一个项写入事件。The following example handles an entry written event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 数组对象是本地计算机上的所有事件日志的快照时对调用进行。The array of objects is a snapshot of all event logs on the local computer when the call to is made. 这不是动态集合，因此它不反映的删除或创建的实时日志。This is not a dynamic collection, so it does not reflect the deletion or creation of logs in real time. 你应验证数组中的日志存在之前读取或写入到它。You should verify that a log in the array exists before you read or write to it. 数组通常包含至少三个日志： 应用程序、 系统和安全。The array usually includes at least three logs: Application, System, and Security. 如果你在本地计算机上创建自定义日志，则它们将显示以及数组中。If you created custom logs on the local computer, they will appear in the array as well. 若要检索事件日志的列表，你必须具有相应的注册表权限。To retrieve the list of event logs, you must have the appropriate registry permissions. 这些权限是与调用所需的相同和。These permissions are identical to those required to call and . ## Examples 下面的示例枚举的本地计算机上定义的事件日志，并显示每个事件日志的配置详细信息。The following example enumerates the event logs defined on the local computer, and displays configuration details for each event log. remarks.format: ## Remarks 数组对象是指定的计算机上的所有事件日志的快照`machineName`参数时对调用进行。The array of objects is a snapshot of all event logs on the computer specified by the `machineName` parameter when the call to is made. 这不是动态集合，因此它不反映的删除或创建的实时日志。This is not a dynamic collection, so it does not reflect the deletion or creation of logs in real time. 你应验证数组中的日志存在之前读取或写入到它。You should verify that a log in the array exists before you read or write to it. 数组通常包含至少三个日志： 应用程序、 系统和安全。The array usually includes at least three logs: Application, System, and Security. 如果指定的计算机上创建自定义日志，则它们将显示以及数组中。If you created custom logs on the specified computer, they will appear in the array as well. 是`static`方法，使其可以调用上类本身。 is a `static` method, so it can be called on the class itself. 不需要创建的实例要使其对方法的调用对象。It is not necessary to create an instance of an object to make a call to the method. 若要检索事件日志的列表，你必须具有相应的注册表权限。To retrieve the list of event logs, you must have the appropriate registry permissions. 这些权限是与调用所需的相同和。These permissions are identical to those required to call and . ## Examples 下面的示例获取在计算机"myServer"上的日志的列表。The following example gets a list of logs on the computer "myServer". 然后，它将输出的每个日志的名称。It then outputs the name of each log. remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，在服务器上存在三个日志文件： 应用程序、 系统和安全。Three log files exist by default on the server: Application, System, and Security. 应用程序和服务使用应用程序日志文件。Applications and services use the Application log file. 设备驱动程序使用的系统日志文件。Device drivers use the System log file. 启用审核后，系统会在安全日志中生成成功和失败审核事件。The system generates success and failure audit events in the Security log when auditing is turned on. 如果你有其他安装，如 Windows 服务器上的 Active Directory 的应用程序可能有其他默认日志文件。If you have other applications installed, like Active Directory on Windows servers, there might be other default log files. 此外，你可以创建本地或远程计算机上的自定义日志文件。In addition, you can create custom log files on a local or remote computer. 自定义日志可帮助组织您的项比你的组件的默认应用程序日志中写入事件时所允许的方式更详细的方式。Custom logs help organize your entries in a more detailed way than is allowed when your components write events to the default Application log. > [!NOTE] > 日志名称被限制为 8 个字符。Log names are limited to eight characters. 根据系统，MyLogSample1 和 MyLogSample2 都是相同的日志。According to the system, MyLogSample1 and MyLogSample2 are the same log. 如果写入事件日志时，它没有足够可用于指定属性。If you write to an event log, it is not enough to specify the property. 必须将关联使用事件日志资源连接到的特定日志的属性。You must associate a property with your event log resource to connect it to a particular log. 不需要指定时仅从一个日志，但事件源中读取必须是与服务器的注册表中的事件日志资源相关联。It is not necessary to specify a when only reading from a log, but an event source must be associated with the event log resource in the server's registry. 你可以仅指定名称和（服务器计算机名称） 以从其中进行读取。You can specify only the name and (server computer name) to read from it. > [!NOTE] > 你不需要指定如果要连接到日志。You are not required to specify the if you are connecting to a log. 如果不指定，本地计算机 ("。") 假定。If you do not specify the , the local computer (".") is assumed. 如果未指定属性，调用返回空字符串，如果未显式设置 (通过设置属性，或通过构造函数)。If the property has not been specified, a call to returns an empty string if has not been explicitly set (by setting the property, or through the constructor). 如果已指定，返回该源已注册到日志的名称。If the has been specified, returns the name of the log to which that source was registered. 一个源一次仅注册到一个日志。A source can only be registered to one log at a time. 如果属性已设置的实例，不能更改属性中的为该而无需更改的值或调用第一个。If the property was set for an instance of , you cannot change the property for that without changing the value of or calling first. 如果你更改属性后的属性已设置，编写日志条目会引发异常。If you change the property after the property has been set, writing a log entry throws an exception. 操作系统将事件日志存储为文件。The operating system stores event logs as files. 当你使用或若要创建新的事件日志，关联的文件存储在指定的计算机上的 %SystemRoot%\System32\Config 目录。When you use or to create a new event log, the associated file is stored in the %SystemRoot%\System32\Config directory on the specified computer. 通过追加的前 8 个字符设置的文件名称".evt"文件扩展名的属性。The file name is set by appending the first 8 characters of the property with the ".evt" file name extension. 无法创建新的日志使用单独 （而不指定日志的源） 的属性。You cannot create a new log using the property alone (without specifying a source for the log). 你可以调用，在一个新的日志名称作为参数传递，然后调用。You can call , passing in a new log name as a parameter, and then call . 但是，目的是通常以创建 （并将条目写入） 新的应用程序特定日志，或用于从现有日志读取。However, the intent is usually either to create (and write entries to) new application-specific logs, or to read from existing logs. 如果值更改，关闭事件日志并释放所有事件句柄。If the value changes, the event log is closed and all event handles are released. > [!CAUTION] > 如果你设置属性不存在日志的名称，系统将附加向应用程序日志中，但不会警告你它正在使用不是你指定的日志。If you set the property to the name of a log that does not exist, the system attaches the to the Application log, but does not warn you that it is using a log other than the one you specified. ## Examples 下面的示例读取在事件日志中，"NewEventLog"本地计算机上的项。The following example reads entries in the event log, "NewEventLog", on the local computer. [!code-cpp[Classic EventLog.Log Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic EventLog.Log Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic EventLog.Log Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic EventLog.Log Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic EventLog.Log Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic EventLog.Log Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 在 Windows Vista 或更高版本，则用户没有访问安全日志的权限。In Windows Vista and later, users do not have permission to access the security log. 如果你正在运行 Windows Vista 或更高版本作为一个用户，你将获得当你尝试访问安全日志中的事件的显示名称。If you are running Windows Vista or later as a user, you will get a when you attempt to access the display name for an event in the security log. > > 在 Windows Vista 或更高版本中，用户帐户控制 (UAC) 决定用户的特权。In Windows Vista and later, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，将为您分配两个运行时访问令牌：一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 默认情况下，您拥有标准用户角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 若要执行的代码访问安全日志，首先必须将你的特权从标准用户提升至管理员。To execute the code that accesses the security log, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator. 你可以通过以下方式执行此操作：右键单击应用程序图标并指示需以管理员身份运行。You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. ## Examples 下面的示例将枚举在本地计算机上定义的事件日志，并显示每个事件日志。The following example enumerates the event logs defined on the local computer and displays the for each event log. remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件源指示什么来记录事件。The event source indicates what logs the event. 通常很的应用程序，名称或名称的子组件的应用程序，如果应用程序非常大。It is often the name of the application, or the name of a subcomponent of the application, if the application is large. 应用程序和服务应写入应用程序日志或自定义日志。Applications and services should write to the Application log or a custom log. 设备驱动程序应写入系统日志。Device drivers should write to the System log. 在你创建新的源，可以仅写入一个日志一次，系统将你的应用程序的事件日志注册为有效项源。When you create a new source, which can only write to one log at a time, the system registers your application with the event log as a valid source of entries. 属性可以是任意字符串，但名称不能由计算机上的其他源。The property can be any string, but the name cannot be used by other sources on the computer. 尝试创建重复的值引发异常。An attempt to create a duplicated value throws an exception. 但是，单个事件日志可以有许多不同的源向其写入。However, a single event log can have many different sources writing to it. ## Examples 下面的示例从本地计算机中删除源。The following example deletes a source from the local computer. 该示例确定从其源日志，然后删除该日志。The example determines the log from its source, and then deletes the log. > [!NOTE] > 多个源可能会写入事件日志。More than one source might write to an event log. 在删除之前自定义日志，请确保没有其他源写入该日志。Before deleting a custom log, make sure there are no other sources writing to that log. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果写入事件日志时，必须将关联使用你要将其连接到的特定日志的事件日志对象。If you write to an event log, you must associate a with your event log object to connect it to a particular log. 不需要指定时仅从日志中读取的属性。It is not necessary to specify the property when only reading from a log. 你可以仅指定名称和（服务器计算机名称）。You can specify only the name and (server computer name). > [!NOTE] > 不需要指定如果要连接到日志。You need not specify the if you are connecting to a log. 如果不指定，本地计算机 ("。") 假定。If you do not specify the , the local computer (".") is assumed. 一个源一次仅注册到一个日志。A source can only be registered to one log at a time. 如果属性已设置的实例，不能更改属性中的为该而无需更改的值或调用第一个。If the property was set for an instance of , you cannot change the property for that without changing the value of or calling first. 如果你更改属性，关闭所有句柄并重新附加到的日志和新的计算机上的源。If you change the property, the closes all handles and reattaches to the log and source on the new computer. 值不能为空字符串。The value cannot be an empty string. 如果显式设置，则默认为本地计算机 ("。")。If it is not explicitly set, it defaults to the local computer ("."). ## Examples 下面的示例读取在事件日志中，"NewEventLog"指定计算机上的项。The following example reads entries in the event log, "NewEventLog", on a specified computer. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性表示的事件日志文件的大小限制。The property represents the size limit of the event log file. 当在事件日志达到配置的大小限制值确定是否将丢弃新条目，或是否新条目覆盖旧条目。When the event log reaches the size limit, the configured value determines whether new entries are discarded, or whether new entries overwrite older entries. > [!NOTE] > 此属性表示此实例所表示的事件日志的配置设置。This property represents a configuration setting for the event log represented by this instance. 当事件日志达到其最大大小时，此属性指定操作系统如何处理为事件日志已注册的所有事件源都写入新条目。When the event log reaches its maximum size, this property specifies how the operating system handles new entries written by all event sources registered for the event log. ## Examples 下面的示例枚举的本地计算机上定义的事件日志，并显示每个事件日志的配置详细信息。The following example enumerates the event logs defined on the local computer, and displays configuration details for each event log. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可以检查事件日志的当前设置。Use the property to examine the current setting for an event log. 使用若要更改的最小天数必须保留在事件日志中的每个条目数。Use to change the minimum number of days that each entry in the event log must be retained. 值取决于在事件日志的已配置的溢出行为。The value depends on the configured overflow behavior of the event log. 如果事件日志的属性设置为，则值为 0。If the property for an event log is set to , then the value is 0. 如果事件日志的属性设置为，则值为-1。If the property for an event log is set to , then the value is -1. 如果事件日志的属性设置为，则值是大于零，并且表示的事件日志已满时保留事件日志条目的天数。If the property for an event log is set to , then the value is greater than zero, and represents the number of days to retain event log entries when the event log is full. 溢出行为仅会在事件日志达到其容量限制时发生。The overflow behavior only occurs when an event log reaches its size limit. 当具有其设置为，和在事件日志达到其最大大小，则新条目如果它们可以将其保留时间超出的条目只能写入段。When an has its set to , and the event log reaches its maximum size, then new entries are written only if they can replace entries whose age exceeds the period. 事件项保留最短期限适合定期存档事件日志时的不同而不同。Retaining event entries for a minimum period is appropriate when the event log is archived regularly. 否则，则可能在事件日志达到其限制时丢失新条目。Otherwise, you risk losing new entries when the event log reaches its limit. 若要避免丢失新的事件信息，请设置基于对您的存档计划为特定的事件日志的事件的最小保留天数。To avoid losing new event information, set the minimum retention days for events based on your archive schedule for a particular event log. ## Examples 下面的示例枚举的本地计算机上定义的事件日志，并显示每个事件日志的配置详细信息。The following example enumerates the event logs defined on the local computer, and displays configuration details for each event log. remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件日志的溢出行为指定要写入到日志已达到其最大文件大小新条目时，会发生什么情况。The overflow behavior for an event log specifies what happens when new entries are to be written to a log that has reached its maximum file size. > [!NOTE] > 溢出行为仅在事件日志达到其最大文件大小时生效。The overflow behavior takes effect only when an event log reaches its maximum file size. 溢出行为不会影响到可以容纳其他事件日志条目的日志写入新的条目。The overflow behavior does not affect writing a new entry to a log that can accommodate additional event log entries. 方法配置事件日志的溢出行为。The method configures the overflow behavior of an event log. 实例。 instance. 为指定的事件日志中调用此方法后属性，和属性值反映新配置的溢出行为。After calling this method for the event log specified by the property, the and property values reflect the newly configured overflow behavior. > [!NOTE] > 此属性表示此实例所表示的事件日志的配置设置。This property represents a configuration setting for the event log represented by this instance. 当事件日志达到其最大大小时，此属性指定操作系统如何处理为事件日志已注册的所有事件源都写入新条目。When the event log reaches its maximum size, this property specifies how the operating system handles new entries written by all event sources registered for the event log. 设置`action`参数以指示新条目覆盖最旧条目时达到其最大大小。Set the `action` parameter to to indicate that a new entry overwrites the oldest entry when the reaches its maximum size. 如果`action`参数设置为、`retentionDays`参数值将被忽略。If the `action` parameter is set to , the `retentionDays` parameter value is ignored. 设置`action`参数以指示每个新条目将覆盖旧条目时达到其最大大小。Set the `action` parameter to to indicate that each new entry overwrites older entries when the reaches its maximum size. 指定在日志中使用的事件必须保留的天数`retentionDays`参数。Specify the number of days that events must be retained in the log using the `retentionDays` parameter. 保持期内写入的事件不会覆盖通过新的条目。Events written within the retention range are not overwritten by new entries. 设置`action`参数丢弃新事件时已达到最大日志大小。Set the `action` parameter to to discard new events when the maximum log size is reached. 如果`action`参数设置为、`retentionDays`参数值将被忽略。If the `action` parameter is set to , the `retentionDays` parameter value is ignored. > [!CAUTION] > 将溢出策略设置为指定当事件日志已满而丢弃新条目。Setting the overflow policy to specifies that new entries are discarded when the event log is full. 如果你使用此设置，请确保定期存档和清除避免达到其最大大小限制事件日志。If you use this setting, ensure the event log is regularly archived and cleared to avoid reaching its maximum size limit. ## Examples 下面的示例显示一个指定的事件日志的已配置的溢出策略，并允许用户选择新事件日志的溢出策略设置。The following example displays the configured overflow policy for a specified event log, and allows the user to select a new overflow policy setting for the event log. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用注册以及自定义事件日志事件查看器中显示的本地化的名称。Use to register and display a localized name in the Event Viewer for custom event logs. 指定的资源标识符必须对应于在资源文件中定义的本地化字符串。The specified resource identifier must correspond to a localized string defined in the resource file. 事件查看器显示使用本地化的字符串和当前区域性设置的自定义事件日志名称。The Event Viewer displays the custom event log name using the localized string and the current culture settings. 例如，你可以定义多个资源文件中的不同区域性的本地化的事件日志名称。For example, you can define multiple event log names localized for different cultures in your resource file. 事件查看器显示当前用户的区域性设置相对应的本地化的字符串。The Event Viewer displays the localized string corresponding to the culture settings of the current user. 如果事件查看器无法从资源文件中，加载本地化的字符串，或如果没有显示名称已注册的事件日志中，事件查看器显示中定义的事件日志名称。If the Event Viewer cannot load the localized string from the resource file, or if no display name was registered for the event log, then the Event Viewer displays the event log name defined in . > [!NOTE] > 不需要注册预定义的事件日志的显示名称。You do not need to register a display name for the pre-defined event logs. 操作系统注册应用程序、 系统和安全事件日志的本地化的显示名称。The operating system registers the localized display names for the Application, System, and Security event logs. ## Examples 下面的示例确定是否将名为事件源`SampleApplicationSource`已在本地计算机上注册。The following example determines whether the event source named `SampleApplicationSource` is registered on the local computer. 如果事件源不存在，该示例设置源的消息资源文件，并创建新的事件源。If the event source does not exist, the example sets the message resource file for the source and creates the new event source. 最后，该示例设置使用中的资源标识符值的事件日志的本地化的显示名称`DisplayNameMsgId`和中的资源文件路径`messageFile`。Finally, the example sets the localized display name for the event log, using the resource identifier value in `DisplayNameMsgId` and the resource file path in `messageFile`. [!code-cpp[EventLog_WriteEvent#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CPP/source.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[EventLog_WriteEvent#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CS/source.cs#6)] [!code-vb[EventLog_WriteEvent#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/VB/source.vb#6)] 该示例使用以下的消息文本文件，内置于 EventLogMsgs.dll 的资源库。The example uses the following message text file, built into the resource library EventLogMsgs.dll. 消息文本文件是从其创建的消息资源文件的源。A message text file is the source from which the message resource file is created. 消息文本文件定义的资源标识符和类别、 事件消息和参数插入字符串的文本。The message text file defines the resource identifiers and text for the category, event message, and parameter insertion strings. 具体而言，为事件日志的本地化名称定义了资源标识符 5001。Specifically, resource identifier 5001 is defined for the localized name of the event log. ``` ; // EventLogMsgs.mc ; // ******************************************************** ; // Use the following commands to build this file: ; // mc -s EventLogMsgs.mc ; // rc EventLogMsgs.rc ; // link /DLL /SUBSYSTEM:WINDOWS /NOENTRY /MACHINE:x86 EventLogMsgs.Res ; // ******************************************************** ; // - Event categories - ; // Categories must be numbered consecutively starting at 1. ; // ******************************************************** MessageId=0x1 Severity=Success SymbolicName=INSTALL_CATEGORY Language=English Installation . MessageId=0x2 Severity=Success SymbolicName=QUERY_CATEGORY Language=English Database Query . MessageId=0x3 Severity=Success SymbolicName=REFRESH_CATEGORY Language=English Data Refresh . ; // - Event messages - ; // ********************************* MessageId = 1000 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_SUCCESS_MESSAGE_ID_1000 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1000, called from %1. . MessageId = 1001 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_FAILED_MESSAGE_ID_1001 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1001, called from %1. . MessageId = 1002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_INFO_MESSAGE_ID_1002 Language=English My generic information message in English, for message id 1002. . MessageId = 1003 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_WARNING_MESSAGE_ID_1003 Language=English My generic warning message in English, for message id 1003, called from %1. . MessageId = 1004 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = UPDATE_CYCLE_COMPLETE_MESSAGE_ID_1004 Language=English The update cycle is complete for %%5002. . MessageId = 1005 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = SERVER_CONNECTION_DOWN_MESSAGE_ID_1005 Language=English The refresh operation did not complete because the connection to server %1 could not be established. . ; // - Event log display name - ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5001 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_DISPLAY_NAME_MSGID Language=English Sample Event Log . ; // - Event message parameters - ; // Language independent insertion strings ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_SERVICE_NAME_MSGID Language=English SVC_UPDATE.EXE . ```

The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件源指示什么来记录事件。The event source indicates what logs the event. 通常很的应用程序，名称或名称的子组件的应用程序，如果应用程序非常大。It is often the name of the application, or the name of a subcomponent of the application, if the application is large. 应用程序和服务应写入应用程序日志或自定义日志。Applications and services should write to the Application log or a custom log. 设备驱动程序应写入系统日志。Device drivers should write to the System log. 只需指定事件源，如果要写入事件日志。You only need to specify an event source if you are writing to an event log. 然后再写入事件日志条目，你必须将注册事件源的事件日志有效的事件源。Before writing an entry to an event log, you must register the event source with the event log as a valid source of events. 当你编写日志条目时，系统将使用属性以查找要在其中放置你的输入适当的日志。When you write a log entry, the system uses the property to find the appropriate log in which to place your entry. 如果您正在读取事件日志，你可以指定，或和。If you are reading the event log, you can either specify the , or a and . > [!NOTE] > 你不需要指定如果要连接到本地计算机上的日志。You are not required to specify the if you are connecting to a log on the local computer. 如果不指定，本地计算机 ("。") 假定。If you do not specify the , the local computer (".") is assumed. 使用和事件写入事件日志。Use and to write events to an event log. 必须指定事件源写入事件;你必须创建并在编写与源的第一个条目之前，配置事件源。You must specify an event source to write events; you must create and configure the event source before writing the first entry with the source. 在你的应用程序的安装过程中创建新的事件源。Create the new event source during the installation of your application. 这样，可以为操作系统来刷新其已注册的事件源的列表和其配置的时间。This allows time for the operating system to refresh its list of registered event sources and their configuration. 如果操作系统未刷新其事件源的列表，并尝试写入新的源的事件写入操作将失败。If the operating system has not refreshed its list of event sources, and you attempt to write an event with the new source, the write operation will fail. 你可以配置新的源使用，或使用方法。You can configure a new source using an , or using the method. 若要创建新的事件源的计算机上，必须具有管理权限。You must have administrative rights on the computer to create a new event source. 你可以创建现有的事件日志或新的事件日志的事件源。You can create an event source for an existing event log or a new event log. 在创建新的源的新的事件日志时，系统将为该日志，此源注册，但之前向其中写入的第一个条目，将不会创建日志。When you create a new source for a new event log, the system registers the source for that log, but the log is not created until the first entry is written to it. 必须是唯一的本地计算机; 上的源新的源名称不能与现有源名称或现有的事件日志名称匹配。The source must be unique on the local computer; a new source name cannot match an existing source name or an existing event log name. 每个源可以一次; 写入只有一个事件日志但是，你的应用程序可以使用多个源写入多个事件日志。Each source can write to only one event log at a time; however, your application can use multiple sources to write to multiple event logs. 例如，你的应用程序可能需要为不同的事件日志或不同的资源文件配置的多个源。For example, your application might require multiple sources configured for different event logs or different resource files. 如果你更改值，到它注册已关闭并释放所有事件句柄。If you change the value, the to which it is registered is closed and all event handles are released. 要写入本地化的项还是要直接写入字符串，则必须配置源。The source must be configured either for writing localized entries or for writing direct strings. 如果你的应用程序将使用资源标识符和字符串值的条目，则必须注册两个单独的源。If your application writes entries using both resource identifiers and string values, you must register two separate sources. 例如，使用资源文件，配置一个源，然后使用在该源方法来编写使用到事件日志的资源标识符的条目。For example, configure one source with resource files, and then use that source in the method to write entries using resource identifiers to the event log. 然后创建不同的源，而无需资源文件，并使用在该源方法使用该源的事件日志中直接写入字符串。Then create a different source without resource files, and use that source in the method to write strings directly to the event log using that source. 若要更改现有源的配置详细信息，必须删除源，然后使用新的配置创建。To change the configuration details of an existing source, you must delete the source and then create it with the new configuration. 如果其他应用程序或组件使用的现有源，请使用更新的配置，而无需删除现有的源创建新的源。If other applications or components use the existing source, create a new source with the updated configuration rather than deleting the existing source. > [!NOTE] > 如果源已映射到某个日志并重新映射到新的日志，必须重新启动计算机才能使更改生效。If a source has already been mapped to a log and you remap it to a new log, you must restart the computer for the changes to take effect. ## Examples 下面的示例创建源`MySource`如果它尚不存在，并将项写入事件日志`MyNewLog`。The following example creates the source `MySource` if it does not already exist, and writes an entry to the event log `MyNewLog`. [!code-cpp[Classic EventLog.Source Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic EventLog.Source Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic EventLog.Source Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic EventLog.Source Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic EventLog.Source Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic EventLog.Source Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于确定本地计算机上是否存在事件源。Use this method to determine whether an event source exists on the local computer. 如果你想要确定本地计算机，使用上是否存在日志。If you want to determine whether a log exists on the local computer, use . 因为此方法访问注册表，你必须在本地计算机，则具有相应的注册表权限否则为将引发。Because this method accesses the registry, you must have the appropriate registry permissions on the local computer; otherwise, a will be thrown. > [!NOTE] > 若要搜索的事件源在 Windows Vista 或更高版本或 Windows Server 2003，必须具有管理权限。To search for an event source in Windows Vista and later or Windows Server 2003, you must have administrative privileges. > > 此要求的原因是所有的事件日志，包括安全性，必须进行搜索以确定事件源是否唯一。The reason for this requirement is that all event logs, including security, must be searched to determine whether the event source is unique. 从 Windows Vista 开始，用户没有权限访问安全事件日志中。因此，引发。Starting with Windows Vista, users do not have permission to access the security log; therefore, a is thrown. > > 从 Windows Vista 开始，用户帐户控制 (UAC) 决定用户的特权。Starting with Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，将为您分配两个运行时访问令牌：一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 默认情况下，您拥有标准用户角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 若要执行访问性能计数器的代码，首先必须将你的特权从标准用户提升至管理员。To execute the code that accesses performance counters, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator. 你可以通过以下方式执行此操作：右键单击应用程序图标并指示需以管理员身份运行。You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. > [!NOTE] > 在下执行服务帐户没有执行此方法所需的权限。A service that is executing under the account does not have the privileges required to execute this method. 解决方法是检查中是否存在事件源，并且如果它不存在，在安装程序中创建源。The solution is to check whether the event source exists in the , and if it does not exist, to create the source in the installer. 因为你无法为新的源的同一台计算机上的现有源名称，使用此方法尝试之前调用以确保源指定的名称与`source`本地计算机上尚不存在。Because you cannot give a new source the name of an existing source on the same computer, use this method before attempting to call to ensure that a source with the name specified by `source` does not already exist on the local computer. `source`参数不区分大小写。The `source` parameter is not case-sensitive. ## Examples 下面的示例创建源`MySource`如果它尚不存在，并将项写入事件日志`MyNewLog`。The following example creates the source `MySource` if it does not already exist, and writes an entry to the event log `MyNewLog`. [!code-cpp[Classic EventLog.Source Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic EventLog.Source Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic EventLog.Source Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic EventLog.Source Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic EventLog.Source Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic EventLog.Source Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于确定指定的计算机上是否存在事件源`machineName`参数。Use this method to determine whether an event source exists on the computer specified by the `machineName` parameter. 如果你想要确定使用指定的计算机上是否存在日志。If you want to determine whether a log exists on the specified computer, use . 因为此方法访问注册表，你必须在给定的服务器中; 上具有相应的注册表权限否则为将引发。Because this method accesses the registry, you must have the appropriate registry permissions on the given server; otherwise, a will be thrown. > [!NOTE] > 若要搜索的事件源在 Windows Vista 或更高版本或 Windows Server 2003，必须具有管理权限。To search for an event source in Windows Vista and later or Windows Server 2003, you must have administrative privileges. > > 此要求的原因是所有的事件日志，包括安全性，必须进行搜索以确定事件源是否唯一。The reason for this requirement is that all event logs, including security, must be searched to determine whether the event source is unique. 从 Windows Vista 开始，用户没有权限访问安全事件日志中。因此，引发。Starting with Windows Vista, users do not have permission to access the security log; therefore, a is thrown. > > 从 Windows Vista 开始，用户帐户控制 (UAC) 决定用户的特权。Starting with Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，将为您分配两个运行时访问令牌：一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 默认情况下，您拥有标准用户角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 若要执行访问性能计数器的代码，首先必须将你的特权从标准用户提升至管理员。To execute the code that accesses performance counters, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator. 你可以通过以下方式执行此操作：右键单击应用程序图标并指示需以管理员身份运行。You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. > [!NOTE] > 在下执行服务帐户没有执行此方法所需的权限。A service that is executing under the account does not have the privileges required to execute this method. 解决方法是检查中是否存在事件源，并且如果它不存在，在安装程序中创建源。The solution is to check whether the event source exists in the , and if it does not exist, to create the source in the installer. 因为你无法为新的源的同一台计算机上的现有源名称，使用此方法尝试之前调用以确保源指定的名称与`source`计算机上尚不存在。Because you cannot give a new source the name of an existing source on the same computer, use this method before attempting to call to ensure that a source with the name specified by `source` does not already exist on the computer. `source`和`machineName`参数不区分大小写。The `source` and `machineName` parameters are not case sensitive. 是`static`方法，使其可以调用类本身上。 is a `static` method, so it can be called on the class itself. 不需要创建的实例调用。It is not necessary to create an instance of to call . ## Examples 下面的示例创建源`MySource`计算机上`MyServer`，和一个项写入事件日志`MyNewLog`。The following example creates the source `MySource` on the computer `MyServer`, and writes an entry to the event log `MyNewLog`. [!code-cpp[Classic EventLog.SourceExists1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic EventLog.SourceExists1 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic EventLog.SourceExists1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic EventLog.SourceExists1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic EventLog.SourceExists1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic EventLog.SourceExists1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当是`null`，方法处理事件调用从系统线程池线程上。When is `null`, methods handling the event are called on a thread from the system thread pool. 系统线程池的详细信息，请参阅。For more information on system thread pools, see . 当事件由 visual Windows 窗体组件，如按钮，通过系统线程池访问组件可能无法工作，或可能导致的异常处理。When the event is handled by a visual Windows Forms component, such as a button, accessing the component through the system thread pool might not work, or might result in an exception. 通过设置来避免这到 Windows 窗体组件时，这将导致处理的方法事件在其创建该组件在同一线程上调用。Avoid this by setting to a Windows Forms component, which causes the methods handling the event to be called on the same thread on which the component was created. 如果在内部使用[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]在 Windows 窗体设计器中，自动设置为控件包含。If the is used inside [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)] in a Windows Forms designer, is automatically set to the control containing the . 例如，如果你将放置form1 设计器上 (其继承自)属性被设置为 form1 的实例。For example, if you place an on a designer for Form1 (which inherits from ) the property of is set to the instance of Form1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法与此关联的事件日志中写入信息项实例。Use this method to write an information entry to the event log associated with this instance. 如果你想要指定任何其他，使用的不同重载。If you want to specify any other , use a different overload of . > [!NOTE] > `message`字符串不能包含 %*n*，其中*n*是整数值 (例如，%1)，因为事件查看器会将其视为插入字符串。The `message` string cannot contain %*n*, where *n* is an integer value (for example, %1), because the event viewer treats it as an insertion string. Internet 协议版本 6 (IPv6) 地址只能包含此字符序列，因为无法记录事件消息包含 IPv6 地址。Because an Internet Protocol, version 6 (IPv6) address can contain this character sequence, you cannot log an event message that contains an IPv6 address. 必须设置属性你组件之前可以将条目写入日志。You must set the property on your component before you can write entries to the log. 你必须创建并在编写与源的第一个条目之前，配置事件源。You must create and configure the event source before writing the first entry with the source. 在你的应用程序的安装过程中创建新的事件源。Create the new event source during the installation of your application. 这样，可以为操作系统来刷新其已注册的事件源的列表和其配置的时间。This allows time for the operating system to refresh its list of registered event sources and their configuration. 如果操作系统未刷新其事件源的列表，并尝试写入新的源的事件写入操作将失败。If the operating system has not refreshed its list of event sources, and you attempt to write an event with the new source, the write operation will fail. 你可以配置新的源使用，或使用方法。You can configure a new source using an , or using the method. 若要创建新的事件源的计算机上，必须具有管理权限。You must have administrative rights on the computer to create a new event source. 如果在指定的源此属性写入你的组件，在计算机上未注册实例调用并注册源。If the source specified in the property of this instance is not registered on the computer that your component is writing to, calls and registers the source. > [!NOTE] > 如果不指定为你实例然后才能调用或，本地计算机 ("。") 假定。If you do not specify a for your instance before you call or , the local computer (".") is assumed. 如果系统需要注册通过调用和未上设置属性你实例，该日志将默认为应用程序日志。If the system needs to register the through a call to and the property has not been set on your instance, the log defaults to the Application log. > [!NOTE] > 许多上面列出的异常由错误生成的注册过程中发生。Many of the exceptions listed above are generated by errors raised during the process of registering the . 要写入本地化的项还是要直接写入字符串，则必须配置源。The source must be configured either for writing localized entries or for writing direct strings. 方法直接写入事件日志将写入给定的字符串; 它不使用可本地化的消息资源文件。The method writes the given string directly to the event log; it does not use a localizable message resource file. 使用方法来写入事件时使用本地化的消息资源文件。Use the method to write events using a localized message resource file. 如果你的应用程序将使用资源标识符和字符串值的条目，则必须注册两个单独的源。If your application writes entries using both resource identifiers and string values, you must register two separate sources. 例如，使用资源文件，配置一个源，然后使用在该源方法来编写使用到事件日志的资源标识符的条目。For example, configure one source with resource files, and then use that source in the method to write entries using resource identifiers to the event log. 然后创建不同的源，而无需资源文件，并使用在该源方法使用该源的事件日志中直接写入字符串。Then create a different source without resource files, and use that source in the method to write strings directly to the event log using that source. > [!NOTE] > 如果远程计算机中写入一个条目，消息 （文本字符串） 的值可能不是你所预期如果远程计算机未在运行.NET Framework。If you write an entry to a remote computer, the value of the message (the text string) might not be what you expect if the remote computer is not running the .NET Framework. > [!NOTE] > 如果`message`参数包含 NUL 字符，则在 NUL 字符处终止事件日志的消息中。If the `message` parameter contains a NUL character, the message in the event log is terminated at the NUL character. ## Examples 下面的示例创建源`MySource`如果它尚不存在，并将项写入事件日志`MyNewLog`。The following example creates the source `MySource` if it does not already exist, and writes an entry to the event log `MyNewLog`. [!code-cpp[Classic EventLog.CreateEventSource Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic EventLog.CreateEventSource Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic EventLog.CreateEventSource Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic EventLog.CreateEventSource Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic EventLog.CreateEventSource Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic EventLog.CreateEventSource Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
